summary: Kate and Humphrey are back. They are getting ready to celebrate Christmas with their pups, but when the youngest pup, Runt disappears without a trace, they must spend the Holidays protecting their family and getting Runt back.
cast: Ben Diskin|Kate Higgins|Debi Derryberry|Marieve Herington|Blackie Rose|Meryl Leigh|John Eric Bentley|Tracy Pfau|R. Martin Klein|Christopher Corey Smith|Shaun Gerardo|Hugh Tyrrell|Harper Fogelson|Willa Fogelson
title: Alpha y Omega, ¡una navidad de aúuupa!
